Push rows of tiles so that your color tiles for a continuous path from one side of the board to the other. Be on your guard as the tiles are shifted at every turn. Will you conceal your color from other players, or with more than two players, will luck or cooperation lead to victory?

STELLA IS ONLY AVAILABLE AS PART OF THE ANCIENT WORLD MULTI GAME SYSTEM

—description from the publisher

name: Hyper Slide
description:
Be quick as you flick, slide or shoot the different-colored hyper discs under the arch. As the game unit calls out the sequence of colors for you to pass, the game knows if you've passed the right disc or not. Pass 'em fast before the buzzer blasts! Obey the voice commands, get your brain in the game and break the code, or guess which color will be called next. Play with a friend or practice solo. Tabletop slide-and-pass excitement features electronic lights and sounds, plus an announcer's voice that talks you through three fast-sliding game modes. Electronic game unit comes with four Hyper Discs, each a different color; plus Hyper Band and instructions.

The game also has a test mode on which let's you test the discs before playing the game. To enter the hidden disc test mode, hold down the two yellow buttons and either inserting a battery or pressing reset, let go of reset and then slide one of the discs near the bar. You can also keep the lights on, disable them and stop the voice repeating the color.

name: Kings of Chicago
description:
Chicago, 1930, Prohibition times. Society is rebelling against the ban on alcohol trade. Almost everyone is looking for their own ways to taste any drink. Home distilleries and smuggling techniques abound. The black market is flourishing, and representatives of the underworld are flourishing
they don't even really hide their actions. Bribes are becoming ubiquitous, and alcohol is no less available than before the ban.

During the game Kings of Chicago, players will take on the role of gang leaders competing for control over strategic locations in Chicago. They will smuggle barrels of alcohol to various places, gradually building your influence. It will be important to adapt to the prevailing conditions in the city and competition movements. The winner will be the one who earns the most from this practice. Do you dare to take part in this dirty game?

In the game, players are taking on the role of alcohol smugglers during prohibited times. They are moving workers' tokens from place to place and smuggling barrels in locations. Every worker has special ability, so it`s important to plan your movement wisely. The game uses an area control mechanism, so achieving as much domination as possible to win is important. At the end of the game, players count their income from locations and money earned during the gameplay. The winner is the person who reached the biggest amount of money.

nawet nieszczególnie kryjÄ… siÄ™ ze swoimi dziaÅ‚aniami. Åapówki stajÄ… siÄ™ wszechobecne, a alkohol nie mniej dostÄ™pny, niÅ¼ przed zakazem.

name: Tatort Meer Fall 2: Verschollen
description:
The Environmental Crime Game
The sailing ship Jan van Gent transports coffee and rum from Puerto Rico to Europe. As the crew arrives in La Palma one person is missing. What happened to Ronja Rack during the passage?
- Investigate different clues and expose environmental sins
- Check alibis and motives
- Analyze sound recordings and videos
- Research online
- Contact involved people by chat and by phone

The line between realtiy and game blurs
The game Tatort Meer Fall 2 - Verschollen includes materials which can be used later in real life. At the end of the case you choose a marine conservation organization to which we donate a part of our earnings.

Your mission
Detect what happened on board of the Jan van Gent and convict the guilty person.

Instructions
Your goal is to solve the case of the missing Ronja. You receive a multitude of documents with further information about different websites and other resources that are relevant to solving the case. You play either alone or together as a team and have to check alibis and deduce logically. Use all available accessories - even cellphones are allowed.

-description from the publisher's website (translated)

name: The Journeys of Paul
description:
This game begins immediately after St. Paul completed his famous four journeys during which he spread the Gospel and established the first churches in the Roman Empire. Each player in the game is a missionary who, like Paul, travels through the Roman Empire attempting to start churches in several key cities. The game simulates the difficulties and challenges confronted by Paul and his companions.

It is not related in any way (apart from theme) to the game by The Avalon Hill Game Co with a similar name, The Journeys of St. Paul.

name: Rory's Story Cubes: Rampage
description:
Rory's Story Cubes: Rampage is an expansion to the creativity game Rory's Story Cubes that contains three new dice with 18 thematic actions. It can be played on its own or in combination with any or all of the other Story Cubes titles.

Roll all three cubes of Rory's Story Cubes: Rampage to start tales of destruction, whether you're using this for creative problem solving, language learning, or story-telling.

name: Pigs on Trampolines
description:
Yippeee! Jump for joy with Pigs on Trampolines! Use the trampolines to bounce your pigs into the pig pen and try to land in the mud puddle! Every pig you land in the puddle earns you a mud pie. Keep on bouncing your pigs until all the mud pies are gone—the muddiest piggy wins!

—descripton from the publisher

name: Word Porters
description: Word Porters is worker placement word game, with each player being in charge of one word. Each player tells other players only by placing workers for the hint which word one has.

name: PokÃ©mon Trading Figure Game
description:
From pokemon-figures.com:

The first release of the Pokemon Trading Figure Game, Next Quest gets players into the action right away with all-time favorite Pokemon like Charizard and Pikachu. Starter sets teach them how to spin, move and attack with their figures, and boosters give players many more choices for expanding their collections!

The Pokemon TFG includes over 40 high quality miniatures and features a new spinning base mechanism. Spin to see if you can knock out your opponent's Pokemon and send them back to the Poke Center. Play Trainer Cards to give your Pokemon in the field an extra advantage. Reach your opponent's goal first to prove you're the real Pokemon Master!

Starter sets contain:
- 3 Pokemon figures with bases (Non-random)
- 1 Trainer figure with base (Non-random)
- 1 Rulebook
- 3 Trainer cards
- Double sided Arena mat (6 vs 6 and 3 vs 3)
- Double sided Collector's map (Figure checklist and how to play guide)

Boosters contain:
- 2 random Pokemon figures
or
- 1 viewable Pokemon figure
or
- 1 viewable and 1 hidden Pokemon figures. 1 trainer card
or
- 2 viewable and 1 hidden Pokemon figures. 1 trainer card

Microbadges:

name: Turning Point: The Battle of Stalingrad
description:
From the rules: Battle of Stalingrad is a simulation of the historical events of the Soviet offensive of 19 Nov., 1942 that led to the famous encirclement and destruction of the German Sixth Army in Stalingrad.

Counters = 200

Not to be confused with Avalon Hill's Turning Point: Stalingrad

name: Double Down
description: Double Down, first released as Lobo 77, is a simple game of playing cards to add to (or subtract from) a running total. Players must try to avoid creating a total which is a multiple of 11, or taking the total over 77. Chips, given out at the start of the game, are lost as players fail to keep to these rules. The last player with chips remaining wins.

name: double side play
description: A trick taking game where each card has 2 numbers, one black and one white, that have a difference of 6 (e.g. 1 and 7). Players must follow suit if they can. The first six tricks are player with the black numbers and the last six with the white numbers. Players are assigned a series of bids to hit during the course of the game. The first player to hit one of their bid options two times wins.

name: Biathlon Crystal Globe
description:
Play as a biathlete in an unbearable suspense race. Biathlon Crystal Globe offers you the possibility of competing in all biathlon disciplines (Sprint, Pursuit, Mass Start, Relay, etc.). One day race, season or Championship. 
Become master of the Crystal Globe!

Choose his characteristics, rather very good at shooting or very good at skiing, unless you prefer him to be good in both disciplines. Each type of biathlete has its own movement die. Build your race to surprise your opponents. You have energy cards that allow you to make the difference in the terrible climbs to leave your competitors behind. But this reserve is not inexhaustible. It's a safe bet that the fate of your race will be decided on the shooting range.

Shooting lying down or standing up, with or without wind, you will have to choose for your biathlete between a fast but risky shot or a more steady and safer shot. Two very different strategies but both can be winning. Because each missed ball will make you lose a lot of time on the penalty ring. It's up to you to choose the one that will win the day before you make the last lap, with the other biathletes chasing you.

Goal of the game: Embody a biathlete during an unbearable suspense race.
How to play: Choose their characteristics, rather very good at shooting or very good at skiing, unless you prefer them to be good in both disciplines. Each type of biathlete has its own set of movement die, shooting dice and Energy deck. 
You have energy cards that allow you to make the difference in the terrible climbs to leave your competitors behind. But this reserve is not inexhaustible. It's a safe bet that the fate of your race will be decided on the shooting range.

Shooting lying down or standing up, with or without wind, you will have to choose for your biathlete between a fast but risky shot or a more steady and safer shot. Two very different strategies but both can be winning. Because each missed ball will make you lose a lot of time on the penalty ring. It's up to you to choose the one that will win the day before you make the last lap, with the other biathletes chasing you.
End of the game: Cross the finish line.

— Description from the publisher

name: Opus-Dei: Existence After Religion
description:
Opus-Dei: Existence After Religion™ is an atheist-themed game built around the world of philosophy, though no philosophical knowledge is needed to play, as it is a purely strategy-based game. The bonus-information, quotes and pictures of the philosophers, scientists and religious figures should however expand most peoples knowledge of philosophy.

When playing the game, a queue of potentially existing philosophers, scientists and fools are lined up for each round. These humans are worth varying amounts of points, according to their intellectual status and magnitude. It is then up to each Zeitgeist, in their turn, to create the best of them into their particular World by playing up to two cards that can serve their best interests. The player with the most points at the end of the game wins!

name: Scotland Yard Junior
description:
Together, the clever detectives chase Mister X around London. Do they guess where he flees next - or does Mister X trick them out again?

As the name implies, Scotland Yard Junior is not only a simplified version of Scotland Yard, it has a quite different ruleset, gameplay and dramaturgy.

name: Golan: Syrian-Israeli Combat in the '73 War
description: Part of the Modern Battles: Four Contemporary Conflicts quadrigames which included standard rules for each game as well as exclusive rules for each game in the series. Golan covers the fighting in the Golan Heights during the 1973 Arab-Israeli War.

name: Rubik's Cage
description:
The Mind-Bending, Mind-Turning Challenge!

Rubik's Cage is the multi-player, multi-plane challenge sure to confound even the very best Rubik's solvers. 
Players take turns either inserting Cubies into the Cage, or twist or turn the Cage to reset the playing field. 
The first player with three of the same colored Cubies in a row wins!

The secret is in how the layers of Rubik's Cage can be turned or flipped...
